name: Shiftly
description: Managing attendance, breaks, and leave across multiple branches was manual, error-prone, and lacked real-time visibility.

context.description: Shiftly is a workforce management tool for retail and hospitality chains. Managers needed a way to track distributed terms, while employees needed a simple way to clock in and view schedules.
context.users: Retail Store Managers, Shift Employees, HR Admins
context.usage: Mobile app for employees (on-the-go); Web dashboard for managers (back-office).

problem.statement: The existing manual process for tracking attendance was causing payroll errors and lack of operational visibility.
problem.core: Managers spent 10+ hours/week reconciling timesheets manually.
painPoints: Buddy punching (employees clocking in for others)
Missed breaks leading to labor law violations
No real-time view of who is currently working

goals.secondary: Eliminate time theft and ensure break compliance.
goals.success: Adoption rate of 90% within the first month of rollout.

constraints: Limited budget for hardware (must work on employee's own devices).
Offline mode required for stores with poor internet connection.
Must integrate with legacy payroll systems.

decisions.title: Geofencing Validation
decisions.desc: We implemented GPS geofencing to validate clock-ins, eliminating the need for expensive biometric hardware while preventing time theft.

decisions.title: simplified 'One-Tap' Actions
decisions.desc: Design the employee interface with massive, unmistakable buttons for primary actions to speed up the queue during shift changes.

decisions.title: Dark Mode for Battery Life
decisions.desc: Since employees use their own phones, we prioritized a dark-mode-first design to save battery and reduce glare in back-of-house environments.

uxFlow.entry: Push notification reminder 15 mins before shift.
uxFlow.primary: Open App -> Verify Location -> Clock In -> View Schedule.
uxFlow.edge: Offline Mode: Data caches locally and syncs when connection restores.

solution.title: Employee Home Screen
solution.caption: The primary action is front and center. The status bar changes color (Green/Red) to give immediate feedback on clock status.

solution.title: Manager Dashboard
solution.caption: A bird's-eye view of all active branches. Managers can approve overtime requests with a single click.

solution.title: Schedule View
solution.caption: Drag-and-drop shift scheduling with conflict detection (e.g., overlapping shifts or overtime warnings).

system.tokens: Inter font family, Primary Blue (#0066FF), Semantic Safety Colors.
system.structure: Atomic design structure with shared atoms between Web and Mobile to ensure brand consistency.

outcome.impact: Payroll errors reduced by 95% in the first quarter.
outcome.efficiency: Manager admin time cut from 10 hours to 2 hours per week.
outcome.quote: "Shiftly has completely transformed how we manage our floor staff. It's invisible and just works."

learnings: Hardware-free solutions require robust fallback mechanisms (what if GPS fails?).
Front-line workers value speed over feature density.
Simplifying the 'Happy Path' is more critical than covering every edge case in v1.
